languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, я с персоной вашего ранга даже рядом никогда не стоял, не то что говорил! Но я подумал — может, вы можете своей волей повлиять на вопрос наследства? Хорошо бы, конечно, и узнать, кто таков Фиделио — но это так, любопытно мне просто..."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I've never even been in the presence of a person of your status, let alone talked to one! But I just thought — maybe you can impose your will on the matter of the inheritance? It would be great to find out who this Fidelio is too, true, but that's nothing, that's just my curiosity..."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, я с персоной вашего ранга даже рядом никогда не стоял, не то что говорил! Но я подумал — может, вы можете своей волей повлиять на вопрос наследства? Хорошо бы, конечно, и узнать, кто таков Фиделио — но это так, любопытно мне просто..."

But I just thought — maybe you can impose your will on the matter of the inheritance? It would be great to find out who this Fidelio is too, true, but that's nothing, that's just my curiosity..."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I've never even been in the presence of a person of your status, let alone talked to one! But I just thought — maybe you can impose your will on the matter of the inheritance? It would be great to find out who this Fidelio is too, true, but that's nothing, that's just my curiosity..."

languages.text: “大人，我这辈子根本没见过像你这么尊贵的人，更别提和这么尊贵的人交谈了！不过我只是在想，或许你可以出手干涉遗产的分配问题？如果能查出这个菲迪奥是谁，那也很不错。不过菲迪奥的身份不是什么大不了的事情，我只是好奇而已……”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I've never even been in the presence of a person of your status, let alone talked to one! But I just thought — maybe you can impose your will on the matter of the inheritance? It would be great to find out who this Fidelio is too, true, but that's nothing, that's just my curiosity..."

traits.locale_text: “大人，我这辈子根本没见过像你这么尊贵的人，更别提和这么尊贵的人交谈了！不过我只是在想，或许你可以出手干涉遗产的分配问题？如果能查出这个菲迪奥是谁，那也很不错。不过菲迪奥的身份不是什么大不了的事情，我只是好奇而已……”

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, nunca había estado siquiera en presencia de alguien de su posición, ¡y mucho menos hablado con ninguno! Pero he pensado... que a lo mejor podría imponer su voluntad sobre el asunto de la herencia. Lo ideal sería descubrir también quién es Fidelio, claro, pero eso no es más que curiosidad...».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I've never even been in the presence of a person of your status, let alone talked to one! But I just thought — maybe you can impose your will on the matter of the inheritance? It would be great to find out who this Fidelio is too, true, but that's nothing, that's just my curiosity..."

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, nunca había estado siquiera en presencia de alguien de su posición, ¡y mucho menos hablado con ninguno! Pero he pensado... que a lo mejor podría imponer su voluntad sobre el asunto de la herencia. Lo ideal sería descubrir también quién es Fidelio, claro, pero eso no es más que curiosidad...».

languages.text: 「陛下、俺はあんたほど偉い人を見たことも話したこともないから失礼なのは承知だ！それでも頼みたいことがある…あんただったら相続の件に介入できるんじゃないか？ついでにフィデリオって奴の正体を知りたいが、それは俺の好奇心を満たすためだから大した問題じゃない…」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I've never even been in the presence of a person of your status, let alone talked to one! But I just thought — maybe you can impose your will on the matter of the inheritance? It would be great to find out who this Fidelio is too, true, but that's nothing, that's just my curiosity..."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、俺はあんたほど偉い人を見たことも話したこともないから失礼なのは承知だ！それでも頼みたいことがある…あんただったら相続の件に介入できるんじゃないか？ついでにフィデリオって奴の正体を知りたいが、それは俺の好奇心を満たすためだから大した問題じゃない…」

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich war noch nie in der Gesellschaft einer Person Eures Status, geschweige denn habe ich ein Gespräch mit ihr geführt! Aber ich dachte – vielleicht könnt Ihr in der Sache der Erbschaft Euren Willen geltend machen? Natürlich wäre es auch schön, herauszufinden, wer Fidelio ist, aber dabei geht es nur um meine Neugier ..."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I've never even been in the presence of a person of your status, let alone talked to one! But I just thought — maybe you can impose your will on the matter of the inheritance? It would be great to find out who this Fidelio is too, true, but that's nothing, that's just my curiosity..."

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich war noch nie in der Gesellschaft einer Person Eures Status, geschweige denn habe ich ein Gespräch mit ihr geführt! Aber ich dachte – vielleicht könnt Ihr in der Sache der Erbschaft Euren Willen geltend machen? Natürlich wäre es auch schön, herauszufinden, wer Fidelio ist, aber dabei geht es nur um meine Neugier ..."

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, je n'avais encore jamais parlé à {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}. C'est même la première fois que je suis en présence de quelqu'un de votre rang ! Alors excusez mes manières, mais je me disais que vous pourriez peut-être imposer votre volonté en ce qui concerne l'héritage. Il pourrait également être intéressant de savoir qui est ce Fidélio, mais c'est de moindre importance. Ce serait juste par pure curiosité de ma part... »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I've never even been in the presence of a person of your status, let alone talked to one! But I just thought — maybe you can impose your will on the matter of the inheritance? It would be great to find out who this Fidelio is too, true, but that's nothing, that's just my curiosity..."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, je n'avais encore jamais parlé à {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}. C'est même la première fois que je suis en présence de quelqu'un de votre rang ! Alors excusez mes manières, mais je me disais que vous pourriez peut-être imposer votre volonté en ce qui concerne l'héritage. Il pourrait également être intéressant de savoir qui est ce Fidélio, mais c'est de moindre importance. Ce serait juste par pure curiosité de ma part... »

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, sizin mevkinizdeki biriyle bırakın konuşmayı, huzurunda bile bulunmadım! Belki nüfuzunuzu miras konusunda kullanabilirsiniz diye düşündüm. Bir de şu Fidelio'nun kim olduğunu öğrenmek güzel olurdu tabii ama çok da mühim değil, meraktan sadece."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I've never even been in the presence of a person of your status, let alone talked to one! But I just thought — maybe you can impose your will on the matter of the inheritance? It would be great to find out who this Fidelio is too, true, but that's nothing, that's just my curiosity..."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, sizin mevkinizdeki biriyle konuşmayı bırakın yanında bile bulunmadım! Belki nüfuzunuzu miras konusunda kullanabilirsiniz diye düşündüm. Bir de şu Fidelio'nun kim olduğunu öğrenmek güzel olurdu tabii ama çok da önemli değil, benim meraklılığım sadece..."
